text: Kandersteg is a municipality in the administrative district of Frutigen- Niedersimmental in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. It is along the valley of the river Kander, west of the Jungfrau massif. ==Gallery== File:Kandersteg.jpg|Kandersteg File:Oeschinensee 03.jpg|Oeschinen Lake ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Kandersteg Tourism Category:Municipalities in Frutigen-Niedersimmental Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland
title: Kandersteg
